message:
Hey there,
I'm a 17-year-old Egyptian. I'll finish high school in 4 months.
I love all kinds of technology.
I've already started learning Front-End Web Development online..Finished HTML/CSS courses and about to finish a Javascript course..
I've little experience with Graphic Design (Mainly Photoshop) and I know I'll have to get better at it to be a better Web Designer.
But I can't really decide which field to choose as my main skill or career.
The main fields I have in mind are: Web Development (Full-stack), Graphic Design (Logos, Branding, and things like that), Android Development, and Motion Graphics (2D).
So..What the hell should I do? :D
Thank you!

data.message:
And here's the post on reddit if you want to reply there:
http://www.reddit.com/r/AskReddit/comments/301xxc/serious_how_do_i_decide_which_career_to_pursue/
Get into all of them and then you'll favour something.
There is /r/cscareerquestions where you might get more help. (more than /r/AskReddit I mean)

get into a CS college/institute,A DECENT one please.  they may teach you lots of classes about computing, AI, software engineer, and the usual CS courses. 
I guess by your 3rd grade you will find what's your real passion. but just keep trying new things until you find it.
Why 3rd grade particulary ? Ahmad A. Elghany

Please do not wait to decide which field to go with, the best thing to do is to start a training or a small freelance job on each field to get a real picture of what u r goin to do the rest of your life, start NOW

3rd grade is the phase which you will decide what will be your graduation project, and if it will be related to your passion or you will do it to learn new things, you still might find it hard to settle down, which area to indulge in.
so, you still need to work and practice until you find it.
Just get a computer, install Linux, Python/Django and look at you tube for tutorials and build your own site :)

بصراحة معيش فلوس لجامعة خاصة :D
و بالنسبة للحكومة انا ادبي ف مش متاح ليا كليات ليها اي علاقة بالـCS.
و انا عايز ادخل ألسن عموماً.
Ahmad A. Elghany
Codeacademy.com

منا Already اتعلمت من Codecademy HTML/CSS و حالياً وصلت 53% في الـJavascript.
Mohamed Samy
Coursera course programming for everybody. I don't really think a Bsc Computer science makes a great dev, you don't even need a Bachelors, you just need to enjoy it.
even better, fuck the education system, go for EDX, Coursera. :)
Forget Universities

I'm currently using Codecademy for coding stuff and Udemy for other things like Graphic Design.
Ahmad A. Elghany
You started with frontend development, it's a very interesting path, keep going and see if you'll keep the excitement forever or something else will catch your attention.
Sameh Magdy if you are going into that field why u may ALSON !!!!

look, مـ الأخر, no one can tell you exactly how to choose your own path.
it's your own. the last thing I can tell is that: look for what you like the most, and let it fu.. - no not this - 
look for what you like the most, and let it kill you :D
Btw the univeristy is not a MUST but its a big advantage , even if it was a small institution

لأن زي ما قلت مفيش كلية ليها علاقة بالمجال ده بتاخد من ادبي.
ف ألطف حاجة لقيتها يعني هي ألسن :D
أكيد مش هخش حقوق او تجارة مثلاً.
Amir Abou Eesa

Regarding the university thing, if you can't make it to a real good university PLEASE don't waste the money on ay 7aga w khalas, get yourself into anything and with the money you save subscribe in ALL the good online learning websites like treehouse and udemy

Oh, learn a European language + English + average tech skills is sure to get you a job at Microsoft or at a multinational company. This is better than being a tech Guru alone. No need to be a Guru, just productive average dev + 2 european languages will make you a great career. :)

Sameh Magdy actually there is a. Lot of private institutions with no money at all might accept. U , and if you get into Tegara it will save u a lot of time to study CS , btw one of the most talented developers I hired didn,t Haas a CS degree , kan Adab bayen

ا
Yeah that's my point.
I'm planning on English as the main language & Spanish as secondary.
بس ربنا بستر و اجيب الـ95% بتوع ألسن اساساً :D
لو مجبتهاش اعتقد بقي مفيش قدامي غير اداب.
Mohamed Samy

I kind of hate Maths so.. :D
Amir Abou Eesa
